resources.string:
Hi, my name is Léo. 

I love programming. 

I can love programming, but I don't do this every day. 
Fun fact is that devs always use stackoverflow. 

I try using Linux every weekday because this is not easy. Isn't more secure, is different. The different is not bad. Just different. 
And sometimes I back to where I was when I started. The C Language. 

Once, when I was studying Data Structures, in my enthusiasm, I did a project in pairs alone. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your first code. 
You should ask someone else about programming, though.
